statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1 AND account_number = '123456789'
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE ssn = '123-45-6789' AND credit_card_number = '9876543210'
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE action_performed = 'Login' AND user_id = 123;
DELETE FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE account_id = 12345 AND encrypted_ssn = 'XXXXXX';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 98765 AND action_performed = 'LOGIN' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CreditCard WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
DELETE FROM account WHERE customer_id = 3 AND balance < 1000;
